channel.title: Lmaopkz source
channel.description:
Okay well this is gonna be my last release cuz i find coding kinda getting boring cuz im not really learning anything so yeh this is my last release alright
Oh i forgot to mention for the client to work with your source you gotta go to client.java and search (555) then you should see something like this Code: [Select] aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_847.method398(255); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_847.method399(555);
switch the 555 to 317 then save compile and it should work then
Heres the links for client and source:
Source is 0.61mb link: http://uppit.com/v/D9VWEW20 Client Kinda big Its 21.04mb link: http://uppit.com/v/6QBRJ906
it has almost full Duel Arena credits 100% Me for it has Full bounty hunter credits 100% owner fritz has custom interfaces has 100% clanchat fully working equipment tab Credits 50% shkic 50% CoonHunter nice pvp area Perfect Claws with special Perfect Pvp armour nice pk point exchange good pest control shitty barrows same old assualt home is edge with shops and objects all around for bounty hunter you go to edgeville dungeon full lunar, ancients, and normal magic almost perfect vengeance
well heres a few pictures
Vengeances!
Pvp!
Pvp Shop!
Bounty Hunter!
Dragon Claws!
Dueling and Stacking!
i didnt really add many npcs so pretty much the same npcs as delta besides shops well that about covers it hope you like my last release please comment let me know what you think :) Bye :D
Oh one last picture i wanted to post was my welcome screen interface and here it is
Some credits to tonic and mitko and lin for the welcome interface :( :( :( :( :)

item.title: Lmaopkz source
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

or just find a new client and or source and replace the run.abt with it like i did.i used blank server and source to replace[quote=“poopoo999, post:8, topic:335625”]@echo off
title Lmao-Pkz V2 Client
cd Lmao-Pkz V2 Client
start JavaW -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit
this is the run.bat code it wont run!! please gimee a run .bat code that works![/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@korkis2009 wrote:

Okay well this is gonna be my last release cuz i find coding kinda getting boring cuz im not really learning anything so yeh this is my last release alright

Oh i forgot to mention for the client to work with your source you gotta go to client.java and search (555)
then you should see something like this
Code: [Select]
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_847.method398(255);
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_847.method399(555);

switch the 555 to 317 then save compile and it should work then

Heres the links for client and source:

Source is 0.61mb link: http://uppit.com/v/D9VWEW20
Client Kinda big Its 21.04mb link: http://uppit.com/v/6QBRJ906

it has almost full Duel Arena credits 100% Me for it
has Full bounty hunter credits 100% owner fritz
has custom interfaces
has 100% clanchat
fully working equipment tab Credits 50% shkic 50% CoonHunter
nice pvp area
Perfect Claws with special
Perfect Pvp armour
nice pk point exchange
good pest control
shitty barrows
same old assualt
home is edge with shops and objects all around
for bounty hunter you go to edgeville dungeon
full lunar, ancients, and normal magic
almost perfect vengeance

well heres a few pictures

Vengeances!

Pvp!

Pvp Shop!

Bounty Hunter!

Dragon Claws!

Dueling and Stacking!

i didnt really add many npcs so pretty much the same npcs as delta besides shops
well that about covers it hope you like my last release please comment let me know what you think Bye

Oh one last picture i wanted to post was my welcome screen interface and here it is
